testsuite.name: com.swag.ui.functionalTests.Swag_NegativeTests

testcase.name: validateRemoveCart_InvalidUser
testcase.system-out: Successfully logged in With Problem User Product Name :: Sauce Labs Backpack Product Description :: carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection. Product Price :: $29.99 Product Price :: $29.99 Product Name :: Sauce Labs Backpack Product Description :: carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection. Product Price :: $29.99 Adding product to Cart removeCart is displayed Removing product from cart removeCart is displayed Unable to Remove Product from Cart

testcase.name: validateLockedUser
testcase.system-out: Tried to loggin with Locked User actual :: Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out. expected :: Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out. Verified Locked user login
